mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_DUR효능군중복품목기본 조회 (DurEftgrpItemMapper.getDurEftgrpItem) */ SELECT eftgrp_dpcn_sn ,mdcn_cd ,eft_group ,group ,group_1 ,eftgrp_dpcn_chck_cd ,gnrl_nm_cd ,gnrl_nm ,item_nm ,bzenty_nm ,mfds_prdct_nm ,mfds_igrd_cd ,mfds_igrd_nm ,pbanc_ymd ,pbanc_no ,aplcn_ym ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_EFTGRP_ITEM" WHERE 1=1 AND eftgrp_dpcn_sn = #{eftgrpDpcnSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_DUR효능군중복품목기본 수정 (DurEftgrpItemMapper.updateDurEftgrpItem) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_EFTGRP_ITEM" SET mdcn_cd = coalesce(#{mdcnCd}, mdcn_cd) ,eft_group = coalesce(#{eftGroup}, eft_group) ,group = coalesce(#{group}, group) ,group_1 = coalesce(#{group1}, group_1) ,eftgrp_dpcn_chck_cd = coalesce(#{eftgrpDpcnChckCd}, eftgrp_dpcn_chck_cd) ,gnrl_nm_cd = coalesce(#{gnrlNmCd}, gnrl_nm_cd) ,gnrl_nm = coalesce(#{gnrlNm}, gnrl_nm) ,item_nm = coalesce(#{itemNm}, item_nm) ,bzenty_nm = coalesce(#{bzentyNm}, bzenty_nm) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,pbanc_ymd = coalesce(#{pbancYmd}, pbanc_ymd) ,pbanc_no = coalesce(#{pbancNo}, pbanc_no) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND eftgrp_dpcn_sn = #{eftgrpDpcnSn}
